persistFocus.description: Whether hovering outside should clear the highlighted state

Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

allowCustomValue.description: Whether to allow typing custom values in the input

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

autoFocus.description: Whether to autofocus the input on mount

closeOnSelect.description: Whether to close the combobox when an item is selected.

composite.description: Whether the combobox is a composed with other composite widgets like tabs

defaultHighlightedValue.description:
The initial highlighted value of the combobox when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the highlighted value of the combobox.

defaultInputValue.description:
The initial value of the combobox's input when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the combobox's input.

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the combobox when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the open state of the combobox.

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the combobox's selected items when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the combobox's selected items.

disableLayer.description: Whether to disable registering this a dismissable layer

form.description: The associate form of the combobox.

highlightedValue.description: The controlled highlighted value of the combobox

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  label: string
  control: string
  input: string
  content: string
  trigger: string
  clearTrigger: string
  item(id: string, index?: number | undefined): string
  positioner: string
  itemGroup(id: string | number): string
  itemGroupLabel(id: string | number): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the combobox. Useful for composition.

immediate.description: Whether to synchronize the present change immediately or defer it to the next frame

inputBehavior.description:
Defines the auto-completion behavior of the combobox.

- `autohighlight`: The first focused item is highlighted as the user types
- `autocomplete`: Navigating the listbox with the arrow keys selects the item and the input is updated

inputValue.description: The controlled value of the combobox's input

loopFocus.description: Whether to loop the keyboard navigation through the items

multiple.description:
Whether to allow multiple selection.

**Good to know:** When `multiple` is `true`, the `selectionBehavior` is automatically set to `clear`.
It is recommended to render the selected items in a separate container.

name.description: The `name` attribute of the combobox's input. Useful for form submission

navigate.description: Function to navigate to the selected item

onExitComplete.description: Function called when the animation ends in the closed state

onFocusOutside.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component

onHighlightChange.description:
Function called when an item is highlighted using the pointer
or keyboard navigation.

onInputValueChange.description: Function called when the input's value changes

onInteractOutside.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component

onOpenChange.description: Function called when the popup is opened

onPointerDownOutside.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component

onValueChange.description: Function called when a new item is selected

open.description: The controlled open state of the combobox

openOnChange.description: Whether to show the combobox when the input value changes

openOnClick.description: Whether to open the combobox popup on initial click on the input

openOnKeyPress.description: Whether to open the combobox on arrow key press

placeholder.description: The placeholder text of the combobox's input

positioning.description: The positioning options to dynamically position the menu

present.description: Whether the node is present (controlled by the user)

readOnly.description:
Whether the combobox is readonly. This puts the combobox in a "non-editable" mode
but the user can still interact with it

scrollToIndexFn.description: Function to scroll to a specific index

selectionBehavior.description:
The behavior of the combobox input when an item is selected

- `replace`: The selected item string is set as the input value
- `clear`: The input value is cleared
- `preserve`: The input value is preserved

skipAnimationOnMount.description: Whether to allow the initial presence animation.

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

value.description: The controlled value of the combobox's selected items

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

immediate.description: Whether to synchronize the present change immediately or defer it to the next frame

onExitComplete.description: Function called when the animation ends in the closed state

present.description: Whether the node is present (controlled by the user)

skipAnimationOnMount.description: Whether to allow the initial presence animation.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
